title: Remake System
body: The remake system needs to be fixed somehow i was in my promos and i get into a game and my adc doesn't connect at first then he gets in the game and leaves immediately this happened about 5 times before i finally joined the game 17 minutes into it and we of course lost it. i don't know how but this needs to be fixed somehow

replies.body:
It's important to remember that the Remake System operates under certain parameters. If any player is marked as *inactive* for 90+ seconds within the first 3 minutes of the match, a remake will become available at 3:00. If a player is inactive shorter than that, or if they disconnect **after** 3:00 has rolled by, the match will **not** qualify for a remake. 

Check out our [/Remake FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ) for more details. Let me know if you have any questions.
